name: 黃麗珠
objective:
創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。

The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

Introduction to Entrepreneurship and Finance
This course aims to enable students to understand how to use financial knowledge and skills to assess the business performance and value of a new venture. This course is specially planned for non-business students. It introduces the following in a simple but profound way:

(1) Distinguish the concepts of entrepreneurship from employment
(2) Concept and application of general financial statements
(3) The theory and practice of entrepreneurial finance
(4) Group simulation of entrepreneurial financial project planning



The goal of the Introduction to Entrepreneurship and Finance course is to enable students to understand how to evaluate the business performance and value of enterprises through financial technology when the company is founded.
This course is specially designed for non-commercial students, and introduces the following in a life-like manner: 
(1) Identify the concepts of entrepreneurship and employment
(2) General financial statement concepts and applications
(3) Theory and Practice of Venture Finance
(4) Simulated venture finance project planning
